data.message:
Very inspiring speech by Mark Zuckerberg!

I've been trying to email my letter to Mr. Zuckerberg but always comes back to me. 

Pardon me everyone but I will post it here.

Good morning Mark.

Thank you for creating Facebook! 

It gave us ordinary citizens of the world a vehicle where we can share insights, knowledge and also learn from them.

You're a genius!

I am from the Philippines, from one of a small city called Dumaguete, a very laid-back place. 

I have one concern or suggestion to your team. I am already retired and one of my past time is writing on my FB wall, sharing my travel experiences domestically complete with pictures. I am using only a cheap android.

I find it very cumbersome retrieving my old posts, say, from years ago. Can your team design a short way to access my posts from way back?

I've been your loyal member of FaceBook since 2009.

Thanks and Gob bless you.

Sincerely yours,

Manny Boy M Galia
A retiree and a senior citizen
Dumaguete City, Philippines

replies.message: Hey Manny! Thanks for the recommendation. Let our team know more by sharing your feedback here: http://bit.ly/2w2IRJW. Have a great day! -Caitlin
thanks for the very quick reply!
